title: The fact-checking mandate evolves from politics to personal security
description: The field of fact-checking is not static; it dynamically evolves to confront the most pressing informational threats of our era. Over the past three decades, its focus has undergone a profound transformation, shifting from the political arena to public health crises and, most recently, to the pervasive world of digital fraud. This evolution reflects a...
